input.sentences: today we celebrated our baby 's first steps at a restaurant .
it was dad 's idea to go out .
grandma and grandpa were so excited for the baby . it was a good day .
output.sentences: Because he learned how to take his first steps they went to the restaurant and celebrated.
The idea to go was from his dad.
And even was able to enjoy some tasty desert too.
This made the little boys grandpa and grandma excited to hear.
